```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library("timevis")
library("tidyverse")

groups <- data.frame(
  id = c("project","person"),
  content=c("Projects","People"),
  style=c("color: red;","color: blue;")
)

data <- read_csv("data.csv") %>%
  mutate(group=str_replace_all(category, " ","_"))

timevis(data, groups)
```
